Robin was walking from school towards his house, he lived near the school, it was only a 10 minute walk.
On his way, he found some strange, glowing coins
1.title: Going home

choices: Yes, but the coins won't be denied.

11.title: Denied narrative?

113.content: So, are the coins sort of like a boomerang- they come back if you throw them away?
113.title: The boomerang effect.

choices: Show off my weight size and king sized strength.
Go for a stroll through downtown Honolulu.
114.content:
Before this interactive story chapter begins, allow me to introduce to you my character who will appear in this story Spunky the Bobcat a 29 year old brown fur colored animated anthropomorphic bobcat that currently dreams of being a king sized animated anthropomorphic bobcat.

One beautiful sunny day in Honolulu Hawaii, yours truly Spunky the Bobcat was at Waikiki Beach as I was currently walking along Waikiki Beach until I found what appeared to be a set of magical coins as I picked one of them up as I decided to try and see if I can fulfill my dream of being a king size animated anthropomorphic bobcat.

"I wish I could be king sized." I said as that magical coin granted my wish as both my size and weight along with my red white and blue swimming trunks skyrocketed to that of being king sized as I noticed my new weight and size.

"Well I'll be, my wish came true and look at me now I'm practically king sized. And now that I'm king sized I've already come up with a new name for me that has a good ring to it, in other words I'll now be known as King Sized Spunky." I said.

Now what will I do next?
114.title: Someone else takes the coins.

1143.content: I'll be honest- I have no idea what the writer meant when he made this option, so... Free reign, I guess?
1143.title: Unknown intent.

11431.content:
(Author's note) What I meant to come up with when I made that option was that my character would go on a misadventure or two around Honolulu Hawaii as that should have been the correctly named option for this story. Also I'd like to hereby apologize for incorrectly naming the previous option for this story.

At that moment instead of having to show off my king sized strength and size, I decided to take a stroll through beautiful downtown Honolulu itself as it was my intent to use those magical coins for good not evil, in other words in the name of truth justice and the all American way.

Afterwards I heavily walked off the beach towards beautiful downtown Honolulu, as some people who saw me heading their way either screamed in terror and ran away or looked up at me in shock and awe.

Now what will happen to yours truly?
11431.title: Reader's choice.

choices: Go to his girlfriend's house and "improve" her
go to the bar and have fun with other girls
12.content:
Then Robin walked towards the coins, but when he got to them, the glowing stopped and he could see a card.
The card said:"When you put enough coins in every bag, I will grant you 3 wishes. My only hint is: there can't be the same amount of coins in two bags."
Robin was a clever boy, he had soon found out how to do it and then the text on the card changed.
Now there stood:"Good job. Now just say your three wishes and I will grant them".
Within seconds he knew what he would wish.
He would wish to be able to change everything, that no one would notice his changes(everyone thinks it has always been that way) and that no one can change him.
But what would he do now??
12.title: The coins

121.content: Robin walked to his girlfriend's house like he always did only this time he was smugly smiling to himself about all the ideas he was getting. When he got there the door opened to reveal...
121.title: Go to his girlfriend's house and "impro...

1211.title: Rob's girlfriend.

choices: Make her suddenly grow bigger all at once and have her aware of them growing?
Make her bigger over time and have it so she has always been that new size?
12111.content:
Sam is your typical college girl, she attends classes, hangs out with friends, and goes out to parties when she feels like it.
Despite her simple life she felt like she wasn't really having a fully successful college life, as pretty as she was with her toned body and long legs, she was on the thin side, especially when the chest is involved. It was something she was very self conscious of. Not that she showed it. She was the definition of a tomboy, typically avoiding make up and hanging out in places like a skate park to unwind. But even their the guys go brain dead at a huge pair of bouncing boobs walks by.
Which only made her all the more envious of what she lacked.
What should he do to help her?
12111.title: Reader's choice.

1212.title: Kate's here.

choices: It does and Beth starts seducing you right away.No
No it was a daydream and not a verbal wish .
121322.content:
As the door opens he sees his girlfriends younger sister Beth, Beth has always been a real knock out, even at eleven years of age, she was a beautiful young girl.


You keep looking at her, never even hearing her speak, inside your head you thought, ' how great would it be if Beth was totally in love with me and she would seduce me even with her sister around' and then you snapped out of your daydream and walked inside of the house.

Did your daydream actually count as a wish of your mind ???
121322.title: Sister
